nodes.text: Han Solo vs. the Space Slug - The Escape Artist
"Han Solo vs. the Space Slug - The Escape Artist" is the twenty-second episode of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It premiered on the StarWarsKids.com website and YouTube on April 5, 2019.

The narrator explains that in a "galaxy of adventures" a pilot must use their wits to escape. The Millennium Falcon flies rings around the Imperial blockade following the Battle of Hoth. Princess Leia tells Han Solo that this "bucket of bolts" will never get them past the blockade. Han tries to reassure Leia by pulling the ship's throttle, but the engines only groan.

Unable to jump into hyperspace, Solo flies the Falcon through the Hoth asteroid belt. Leia is shocked at Solo's recklessness, but he responds that the Empire would be crazy to follow them. Solo flies the Falcon through the asteroids, causing Leia, Chewbacca, and C-3PO to cling for dear life.

Later, inside an "asteroid," Han and his friends exit the Falcon to investigate the ship's surroundings. Leia notices the ground feels strange. Solo shoots a mynock, which causes the "ground" to shake. The four blast off in the Falcon and travel through the "tunnel." Leia remarks that the "cave" is collapsing, but Solo realizes that is no cave as they see the teeth of a space slug. They escape the space slug and fly into space. Solo is smug, but Leia and Chewbacca look tired while C-3PO is hanging upside down.
